entry.title: New P2P commands for diagnostics, SPV clients
entry.summary: Mike Hearn suggests a three-part change for a project, with the first step being to add the mempool command and make nodes sync up their mempools on startup. Jeff Garzik provides the implementation for the mempool command, which can be found on GitHub. While SPV nodes would benefit from this feature, Garzik is unsure about full node mempool sync at startup, as he appreciates the organic growth and random nature of mempools.
